section.title: ISO Provisioning
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine also allows ISO provisioning from Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager datastores. To use this feature, you will need to do the following before creating a provision request.

procedure.title: To Prepare for an ISO Provision Request

step.para: Add the ISO Datastore. The Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager system must have already been discovered or added into the VMDB. For more information, see the Insight Guide.
